department_balance.description: Shift counts across departments cannot differ by more than 1

core_skill_requirement.description: Each department shift must include at least 1 nurse with the department's core skill

skill_mix_requirement.description: Each department shift must include nurses with at least 3 different skills

preferences.objective: maximize assignments that match nurse preferences (Morning/Evening/Night)

unavailability.rule: Nurses cannot be assigned to shifts listed in their unavailability
